front.title: PAK: Password-Authenticated Key Exchange for iSCSI

abstract.t: This draft describes a password-authenticated key exchange protocolcalled PAK [PAK,PAK-Orig] that is secure against both a passiveeavesdropper and an active attacker, i.e., one who may insert, block,or modify messages sent over a network. In particular, it does notallow either type of attacker to obtain any information that wouldenable an off-line dictionary attack on the password. We discuss howthis password-authenticated key exchange protocol may be used withiSCSI [iSCSI].
